// Espace conseils Definition of fetal suffering Fetal suffering is a medical term used to describe a decrease in oxygenation. Fetal suffering is not a pain but a medical term used to designate a decrease in oxygenation (hypoxia). There are two types of fetal suffering: Read Article Causes of fetal suffering There are many causes of fetal suffering during pregnancy. For example: Tips Chronic fetal suffering (or hypoxia) that occurs during pregnancy (it evolves over several weeks or months)
Acute fetal suffering (or hypoxia) that occurs during the time of birth. Note: at a more serious stage, we speak of anoxia when there is an absence of oxygen in the tissues. L anémie : une baisse anormale du taux d hémoglobine dans le sang. Grossesse prolongée. Placenta prævia. Gros enfant. Maladie cardiovasculaire ou hypertension artérielle de la mère. Here are some solutions in case of fetal suffering Solutions for fetal suffering Consommer suffisamment de produits animaux (de viandes rouges) , Augmenter la consommation de fruits et légumes Un suivi médical renforcé, qui consiste en la surveillance à l hôpital entre 2 et 3 fois par semaine Une césarienne Une activité physique régulière , pendant 30 min, cinq fois par semaine Protecting your health
Our highest priority
